name: Amelia's Journey
description:
We created this game for the "Sheroes in Game" gamejam, that was held for only 9 hours on Spetember the 10th. Here we bring the famous story of Amelia Earhart and we created a fun experience to enjoy her trip around the world. Hope you like it!

===========================================================
